title: Baked Stuffed Aubergines
ingredients: ['4 small-medium aubergines', '2 litres sunflower oil (for deep frying)', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '1 green pepper, finely chopped', '1 red pepper, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '2 large ripe tomatoes, finely chopped', '1 pinch of sugar', 'salt and pepper', 'a handful finely chopped parsley', '3-4 tablespoons lemon juice']
